text:
The Surah derived its name from the word an-Naba in the second verse. This is not only a name but also a title of its subject matter, for Naba implies the news of Resurrection and Hereafter and the whole Surah is devoted to the same theme.

Period of Revelation

As we have explained in the introduction to Surah Al-Mursalat, the theme of all the Surahs, from Al-Qiyamah to An-Naziat, closely resembles one another's, and all these seem to have been revealed in the earliest period at Makkah.

Theme and Subject Matter

Its theme also is the same as of Surah Al-Mursalat, i. e. to affirm the Resurrection and Hereafter, and to warn the people of the consequences of acknowledging or disacknowledging it.

When the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) first started to preach Islam in Makkah, his message consisted of three elements: (1) That none be held as an associate with Allah in Godhead; (2) that Allah had appointed him as His Messenger; (3) that this world will come to an end one day and then another world will be established when all the former and the latter generations will be resurrected with the same bodies in which they lived and worked in the world; then they will be called to account for their beliefs and deeds and those who emerge as believing and righteous in this accountability will go to Paradise and those who are proved to be disbelieving and wicked will live in Hell for ever.

Of these although the first thing was highly unpleasant for the people of Makkah, yet in any case they were not disbelievers in the existence of Allah. They believed in His Being the Supreme Sustainer, Creator and Providence and also admitted that all those beings whom they regarded as their deities, were themselves Allah's creatures. Therefore, in this regard the only thing they disputed was whether they had any share in the attributes and powers of Divinity and in the Divine Being itself or not.

As for the second thing, the people of Makkah were not prepared to accept it. However, what they could not possibly deny was that during the 40 years life that the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) had lived among them before his claim to Prophethood, they had never found him a lying deceitful person or the one who would adopt unlawful methods for selfish ends. They themselves admitted that he was a man possessed of wisdom, righteousness and moral superiority. Therefore, in spite of charging him with a thousand false accusations, nothing to say of making others believe, they were finding it difficult even for themselves to believe that although he was an honest and upright man in every other affair and dealing of life, yet, God forbid, a liar only in his claim to be a Prophet.

Thus, the first two things were not in fact so perplexing for the people of Makkah as the third thing. When this was presented before them, they mocked it most of all, expressed unusual wonder at it, and regarding it as remote from reason and impossible, started talking against it as incredible, even inconceivable, in their assemblies. But in order to bring them to the way of Islam it was absolutely essential that the doctrine of the Hereafter should be instilled into their minds, for without belief in this doctrine, it was not at all possible that they could adopt a serious attitude with regard to the truth and falsehood, could change their standard of values in respect of good and evil, and giving up worship of the world, could be inclined to follow the way that Islam urged them to follow. That is why in the earliest Surahs revealed at Makkah the doctrine of the Hereafter has been impressed and stressed more than anything else. However, the arguments for it have been given in
such a way that the doctrine of the Oneness of God (Tauhid) also is impressed on the minds automatically. This also contains brief arguments, here and there, to confirm the truth of the Holy Messenger of Allah and the Qur'an.

After understanding well why the theme of the Hereafter has been so frequently repeated in the Surahs of this period, let us now have a look at the subject matter of this Surah. In it first of all, allusion has been made to the common talk and the doubts that were being expressed in every street of Makkah and in every assembly of the people of Makkah on hearing the news about Resurrection. Then, the deniers have been asked: "Don't you see this earth which We have spread as a carpet for you? Don't you see the high mountains which we have so firmly placed in the earth?Don't you consider your own selves how We have created you as pairs of men and women?Don't you consider your sleep by which We make you seek a few hours rest after every few hours labour and toil so as to keep you fit for work in the world? Don't you see the alternation of the night and day which We are so regularly perpetuating precisely according to your needs and requirements?Don't you see the strongly fortified
system of the heavens above you? Don't you see the sun by means of which you are receiving your light and heat? Don't you see the rains which fall from the clouds and help produce corns and vegetables and luxuriant gardens? Do these things only tell you that the power of the Almighty Being Who has created them, will be unable to bring about Resurrection and establish the Next World? Then, from the supreme wisdom which is clearly working in this world around you, do you only understand this that although each part of it and each function of it is purposive, yet life is meaningless? Nothing could be more absurd and meaningless that after appointing man to the office of foreman and granting him vast powers of appropriation, in this workhouse, when he leaves the world after fulfilling his role, he should be let off without any accountability. He should neither be rewarded and granted pension on satisfactory work, nor subjected to any accountability and punishment on unsatisfactory
performance of duty.

After giving these arguments it has been emphatically stated that the Day of Judgment shall certainly come to pass on its appointed time. No sooner is the Trumpet sounded than whatever is being foretold shall appear before the eyes, and whether you believe in it today, or not, at that time you will come out in your multitudes from wherever you would be lying dead and buried to render your account. Your denial cannot in any way avert this inevitable event.

Then, in vv. 21-30; it has been stated that every single misdeed of those who do not expect any accountability to take place and have thus belied Our Revelations, lies reckoned and recorded with Us, and Hell is ever lying an ambush to punish them and punish them fully for all their doings. Then, in vv. 31-36, the best rewards of those who lived as responsible people in the world and have provided for their Hereafter beforehand have been mentioned. They have been reassured that they will not only be rewarded richly for their services but in addition they will also be given sufficient gifts.

In conclusion, the Divine Court in the Hereafter has been depicted, making it plain that there will be no question of somebody's being adamant in the matter of getting his followers and associates forgiven, none will speak without leave, and leave will be granted on the condition that intercession be made only for the one to whom leave of intercession will have been given, and the intercessor will say only what is right. Moreover, leave for intercession will be given only for those who had acknowledged the Truth in the world but were sinners; rebels of God and rejectors of the Truth will deserve no intercession at all.

The discourse has been concluded with this warning: The Day the coming of which is being foretold, shall certainly come to pass. Do not think it is yet far off, it is close at hand. Now, whoever wills, let him believe in it and take the way towards his Lord. But he who disbelieves, in spite of the warning, "will have all his deeds placed before him: and he will exclaim regretfully: "Oh, would that I were not born in the world!" At that time, his regrets will be about the same world of which he is so enamored today!
description: The surah that mentions The [Great] Tiding of the coming of the Day og Judgment, the truth of which people yet dispute. It takes its name from the expression “the great tiding” (al-nabaʾ al-ʿaẓīm). The disbelievers often asked incredulously about the Resurrection. This surah gives evidence of God’s power, then explains what will happen on the Day of Resurrection, and the respective fates of believers and disbelievers.The surah is also known as: The Announcement, The Great News, The Important News, The News.

Albanian.verse 78:3: për të cilin ata kanë mendime të ndryshme.
Albanian.verse 78:4: Jo, jo, ata, me siguri, do ta dinë!
Albanian.verse 78:5: E pastaj, sërish, me të vërtetë, do ta dinë!
Albanian.verse 78:6: A nuk u kemi bërë ne Tokën shtrat?
Albanian.verse 78:8: Ne ju kemi krijuar dy lloje (mashkull e femër),
Albanian.verse 78:9: dhe gjumin tuaj ua kemi bërë çlodhje,
Albanian.verse 78:10: kure natën ua kemi bërë mbulesë,
Albanian.verse 78:11: dhe ditën e kemi caktuar për jetesë (ekonomizim),
Albanian.verse 78:12: dhe mbi ju kemi ndërtuar shtratë qiej të fortë.
Albanian.verse 78:13: Dhe kemi krijur kandil (diell) të shëndritshëm!
Albanian.verse 78:14: Ne, nga retë, u leshojmë ujëra të mëdha (shira)
Albanian.verse 78:15: për rritjen e drithërave dhe bimëve,
Albanian.verse 78:17: Me të vërtetë, Dita e sqarimit, është caktuar,
Albanian.verse 78:18: Dita kur do të fryhet në buri (Sur), e do të vini ju, grupe-grupe,
Albanian.verse 78:19: dhe qielli do të hapet dhe do të bëhet dyer,
Albanian.verse 78:20: dhe malet lëvizin e bëhen si hije e ajrit (fatamorganë).
Albanian.verse 78:21: Me të vërtetë, Skëterra do të bëhet pusi,
Albanian.verse 78:24: në të, nuk do të shijojnë as freskim, as pije,
Albanian.verse 78:25: përpos ujit të vluar dhe qelbësirave,
Albanian.verse 78:27: Ata, me të vërtetë, nuk kanë menduar në dhënie të llogarisë,
Albanian.verse 78:28: dhe argumentet Tona i kanë mohuar krejtësisht,
Albanian.verse 78:29: por Ne, çdo gjë e kemi numërura dhe shënuar.
Albanian.verse 78:30: “Andaj, shijoni, Ne do t’ju shtojmë vetëm dënimin”.
Albanian.verse 78:31: E, me të vërtetë, për ata që i kanë druajtur Perëndisë, u janë përgatitur vende kënaqësie:
Albanian.verse 78:33: dhe vajza të reja, të njëjtës moshë,
Albanian.verse 78:35: Nuk do të dëgjojnë atje (në xhennet) biseda të kota as gënjeshtra,
Albanian.verse 78:36: (ky është) shpërblimi i Zotit tënd, i dhënë sipas llogarisë (së veprave të tyre),
Albanian.verse 78:37: Zotit të qiejve dhe të Tokës, dhe çka gjendet në mes tyre, Mëshiruesi, të cilit askush nuk do të mund t’i bëzejë (flas),
Albanian.verse 78:38: në Ditën kur Xhebraili dhe engjëjt do të jenë të rreshtuar, e nuk do të flas askush, përpos atij që do t’i lejojë Mëshiruesi, e që do të thonë të vërtetën.
Albanian.verse 78:39: Ajo është Ditë e pashmangshme, e kush të dojë, do ta marr strehimin te Zoti i vet.
Albanian.verse 78:40: Me të vërtetë, Ne u kemi paralajmëruar se është i afërt dënimi, në Ditën kur njeriu do t’i shohë veprat e tija, dhe, kur jobesimtari, do të thotë: “Ah, të isha dhé!”

Amharic.verse 78:15: በእርሱ እኽልንና ቅጠላ ቅጠልን እናወጣ ዘንድ (አወረድን)፡፡
Amharic.verse 78:18: በቀንዱ በሚነፋና የተለያዩ ጭፍሮች ኾናችሁ በምትመጡ ቀን ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 78:37: የሰማያትና የምድር በመካከላቸውም ያለው ሁሉ ጌታ በጣም አዛኝ ከኾነው (ተመነዱ)፡፡ ከእርሱ ጋር መነጋገርን አይችሉም፡፡
Amharic.verse 78:38: መንፈሱ (ጂብሪል) መላእክቶቹም የተሰለፉ ኾነው በሚቆሙ ቀን አል-ረሕማን ለእርሱ የፈቀደለትና ትክክለኛን ቃል ያለ ሰው ቢኾን እንጅ (መነጋገርን አይችሉም)፡፡
Amharic.verse 78:39: ይህ የተረጋገጠው ቀን ነው፡፡ የሻም ሰው ወደ ጌታው መመለስን ይይዛል፡፡
Amharic.verse 78:40: እኛ ሰው ሁሉ እጆቹ ያስቀደሙትን በሚያይበትና ከሓዲውም ዋ ምኞቴ! ምንነው ዐፈር በኾንኩ በሚልበት ቀን ቅርብ የኾነን ቅጣት አስጠነቀቅናችሁ፡፡

Azerbaijani.verse 78:4: Xeyr, onlar Qiyamətin həqiqət olduğunu hökmən biləcəklər!
Azerbaijani.verse 78:5: Bir daha xeyr! Onlar hökmən biləcəklər!

Azerbaijani.verse 78:16: habelə ağaclarının qol-budaqları bir-birinə sarmaşan bağlar salaq.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:17: Həqiqətən, ayırd etmə günü bəlli bir vaxta təyin edilmişdir!
Azerbaijani.verse 78:18: Sur üfürüləcəyi gün siz dəstə-dəstə gələcəksiniz.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:20: Dağlar da hərəkətə gətirilib ilğıma çevriləcək.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:21: Həqiqətən, Cəhənnəm kafirlər üçün pusquda dayanıb gözləyir.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:24: Onlar orada nə bir sərinlik, nə də sərinlədirici içki dadacaqlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:25: İçdikləri yalnız qaynar su və irin olacaq –
Azerbaijani.verse 78:26: Törətdikləri əməllərinə uyğun bir cəza kimi.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:27: Doğrusu, onlar haqq-hesab çəkiləcəklərinə ümid etmirdilər.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:29: Biz hər bir şeyi hesablayıb yazmışıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:30: Elə isə dadın əzabı! Biz sizə əzabdan başqa bir şey artırmayacağıq!
Azerbaijani.verse 78:31: Həqiqətən, müttəqilər üçün nicat yeri vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:34: və ləbələb doldurulmuş qədəhlər də vardır!
Azerbaijani.verse 78:35: Onlar orada nə mənasız sözlər, nə də iftira eşidəcəklər.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:36: Bunlar sənin Rəbbindən olan mükafatlar, artıqlaması ilə verilən töhfələrdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:37: Göylərin, yerin və onların arasında olanların Mərhəmətli Rəbbindən mükafatdır. Onlar Allahın hüzurunda bir söz deməyə qadir olmayacaqlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:38: Ruh (Cəbrail) və mələklər səf-səf duracağı gün, Mərhəmətli Allahın izin verdiyi kimsələrdən və doğru söz deyənlərdən başqa heç kəs danışmayacaq.
Azerbaijani.verse 78:39: O gün, gerçək bir gündür. Kim istəsə öz Rəbbi yanında sığınacaq tapar!
Azerbaijani.verse 78:40: Həqiqətən, Biz sizi yaxın əzab barədə xəbərdar etdik. O gün insan öz əlləri ilə nələr etdiyini görəcək, kafir isə deyəcəkdir: “Kaş mən torpaq olaydım!”

Bengali.verse 78:1: তারা পরস্পরে কি বিষয়ে জিজ্ঞাসাবাদ করছে?
Bengali.verse 78:5: অতঃপর না, সত্বর তারা জানতে পারবে।
Bengali.verse 78:8: আমি তোমাদেরকে জোড়া জোড়া সৃষ্টি করেছি,
Bengali.verse 78:12: নির্মান করেছি তোমাদের মাথার উপর মজবুত সপ্ত-আকাশ।
Bengali.verse 78:13: এবং একটি উজ্জ্বল প্রদীপ সৃষ্টি করেছি।
Bengali.verse 78:14: আমি জলধর মেঘমালা থেকে প্রচুর বৃষ্টিপাত করি,
Bengali.verse 78:15: যাতে তদ্দ্বারা উৎপন্ন করি শস্য, উদ্ভিদ।
Bengali.verse 78:18: যেদিন শিংগায় ফুঁক দেয়া হবে, তখন তোমরা দলে দলে সমাগত হবে।
Bengali.verse 78:19: আকাশ বিদীর্ণ হয়ে; তাতে বহু দরজা সৃষ্টি হবে।
Bengali.verse 78:20: এবং পর্বতমালা চালিত হয়ে মরীচিকা হয়ে যাবে।
Bengali.verse 78:23: তারা তথায় শতাব্দীর পর শতাব্দী অবস্থান করবে।
Bengali.verse 78:24: তথায় তারা কোন শীতল এবং পানীয় আস্বাদন করবে না;
Bengali.verse 78:25: কিন্তু ফুটন্ত পানি ও পূঁজ পাবে।
Bengali.verse 78:27: নিশ্চয় তারা হিসাব-নিকাশ আশা করত না।
Bengali.verse 78:28: এবং আমার আয়াতসমূহে পুরোপুরি মিথ্যারোপ করত।
Bengali.verse 78:29: আমি সবকিছুই লিপিবদ্ধ করে সংরক্ষিত করেছি।
Bengali.verse 78:30: অতএব, তোমরা আস্বাদন কর, আমি কেবল তোমাদের শাস্তিই বৃদ্ধি করব।
Bengali.verse 78:35: তারা তথায় অসার ও মিথ্যা বাক্য শুনবে না।
Bengali.verse 78:36: এটা আপনার পালনকর্তার তরফ থেকে যথোচিত দান,
Bengali.verse 78:37: যিনি নভোমন্ডল, ভূমন্ডল ও এতদুভয়ের মধ্যবর্তী সবকিছুর পালনকর্তা, দয়াময়, কেউ তাঁর সাথে কথার অধিকারী হবে না।
Bengali.verse 78:38: যেদিন রূহ ও ফেরেশতাগণ সারিবদ্ধভাবে দাঁড়াবে। দয়াময় আল্লাহ যাকে অনুমতি দিবেন, সে ব্যতিত কেউ কথা বলতে পারবে না এবং সে সত্যকথা বলবে।
Bengali.verse 78:39: এই দিবস সত্য। অতঃপর যার ইচ্ছা, সে তার পালনকর্তার কাছে ঠিকানা তৈরী করুক।
Bengali.verse 78:40: আমি তোমাদেরকে আসন্ন শাস্তি সম্পর্কে সতর্ক করলাম, যেদিন মানুষ প্রত্যেক্ষ করবে যা সে সামনে প্রেরণ করেছে এবং কাফের বলবেঃ হায়, আফসোস-আমি যদি মাটি হয়ে যেতাম।

Berber Amazigh.verse 78:37: Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen; Aênin, ur zmiren a ten Ioo a d mmeslayen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 78:38: Asmi ara beddent lmalayek akked ôôuê, d idurra, siwa win Iooa Uênin ara d immeslayen; a d yini awal uûwib.
Berber Amazigh.verse 78:39: D wagi ay d ass n tidep; win ib$an, idda d ubrid n tu$alin ar Mass is.
Berber Amazigh.verse 78:40: Ih, Nâaggen awen: aâaqeb d ayen iqeôben. Ass ideg ara iéeô umdan, acu xedmen ifassen is, ad yini ujehli: "a ssexv iw, a lemmer lli$ d akal"!

Bosnian.verse 78:1: O čemu oni jedni druge pitaju?
Bosnian.verse 78:3: o kojoj oni različita mišljenja imaju.
Bosnian.verse 78:4: To nije dobro, oni će saznati sigurno!
Bosnian.verse 78:5: I još jednom, to nije dobro, oni će saznati sigurno!
Bosnian.verse 78:12: i iznad vas sedam silnih sazdali,
Bosnian.verse 78:14: Mi iz oblaka vodu obilno spuštamo
Bosnian.verse 78:15: i činimo da uz njenu pomoć raste žito i bilje,
Bosnian.verse 78:17: Dan sudnji je, zaista, već određen,
Bosnian.verse 78:18: Dan kada će se u Rog puhnuti, pa ćete vi, sve skupina po skupina, dolaziti,
Bosnian.verse 78:19: i nebo će se otvoriti i mnogo kapija imati,
Bosnian.verse 78:20: i planine će se zdrobiti i priviđenje će biti.
Bosnian.verse 78:24: u njemu svježine neće osjetiti, ni pića okusiti,
Bosnian.verse 78:27: Oni nisu očekivali da će račun polagati
Bosnian.verse 78:28: i dokaze Naše su pretjerano poricali,
Bosnian.verse 78:29: a Mi smo sve pobrojali i zapisali –
Bosnian.verse 78:30: pa trpite, mučenje ćemo vam sve gorim učiniti.
Bosnian.verse 78:31: A onima koji su se Allaha bojali želje će se ostvariti:
Bosnian.verse 78:35: Tamo prazne besjede i neistinu neće slušati,
Bosnian.verse 78:36: Gospodar tvoj će ih darom obilnim nagraditi,
Bosnian.verse 78:37: Gospodar nebesa i Zemlje i onoga što je između njih, Milostivi, kome neće smjeti niko prvi riječ prozboriti
Bosnian.verse 78:38: na Dan kada Džibril i meleki budu u redove poredani, kada će samo onaj kome Milostivi dozvoli govoriti, a istinu će reći.
Bosnian.verse 78:39: To je neizbježan Dan, pa ko hoće, Gospodaru svome će, kao utočištu, poći.
Bosnian.verse 78:40: Mi vas na skoru patnju upozoravamo, na Dan u kome će čovjek djela ruku svojih vidjeti, a nevjernik uzviknuti: "Da sam, bogdo, zemlja ostao!"

Bulgarian.verse 78:1: За какво се питат един друг?
Bulgarian.verse 78:5: И пак - не! Те ще узнаят.
Bulgarian.verse 78:6: Не сторихме ли Ние земята постеля
Bulgarian.verse 78:12: и съградихме над вас седем непоклатими небеса,
Bulgarian.verse 78:14: и изсипваме от дъждовните облаци обилна вода,
Bulgarian.verse 78:15: за да извадим чрез нея зърна и растения,
Bulgarian.verse 78:18: Денят, когато се протръби с Рога и ще дойдете на тълпи,
Bulgarian.verse 78:19: и ще се разтвори небето, и ще стане на двери,
Bulgarian.verse 78:20: и планините ще бъдат раздвижени, и ще станат на мираж.
Bulgarian.verse 78:24: Не ще вкусят там нито прохлада, нито питие,
Bulgarian.verse 78:27: Не се надяваха те на равносметка.
Bulgarian.verse 78:28: И взимаха за пълна лъжа Нашите знамения.
Bulgarian.verse 78:29: Но всяко нещо вписахме в книга.
Bulgarian.verse 78:30: Затова вкусете! Не ще увеличим за вас друго освен мъчението.
Bulgarian.verse 78:33: и с напъпили гърди - девствени връстнички,
Bulgarian.verse 78:35: Не ще чуват там нито празнословие, нито лъжа -
Bulgarian.verse 78:36: въздаяние от твоя Господ - достатъчен дар,
Bulgarian.verse 78:37: Господа на небесата и на земята, и на всичко между тях, Всемилостивия. Не ще могат с Него да говорят
Bulgarian.verse 78:38: в Деня, в който Духът [Джибрил] и ангелите ще се възправят в редица. Не ще продумат, освен комуто Всемилостивият позволи, и той правдиво ще говори.
Bulgarian.verse 78:39: Този е Денят на истината. А който пожелае, да търси пристан при своя Господ.
Bulgarian.verse 78:40: Предупредихме ви за близко мъчение в Деня, в който всеки ще види какво е сторил преди с ръцете си. И неверникът ще каже: “О, да можех да съм прах!”

Chinese.verse 78:1: 他们互相询问，询问什么？
Chinese.verse 78:3: 就是他们所争论的消息。
Chinese.verse 78:4: 绝不然！他们将来就知道了。
Chinese.verse 78:5: 绝不然，他们将来就知道了。
Chinese.verse 78:6: 难道我没有使大地如摇篮，
Chinese.verse 78:9: 我曾使你们从睡眠中得到休息，
Chinese.verse 78:12: 我曾在你们上面建造了7层坚固的天，
Chinese.verse 78:14: 我从含水的云里，降下滂沱大雨，
Chinese.verse 78:15: 以便我借它而生出百谷和草木，
Chinese.verse 78:17: 判决之日，确是指定的日期，
Chinese.verse 78:18: 在那日，号角将被吹向，你们就成群而来；
Chinese.verse 78:19: 天将被开辟，有许多门户；
Chinese.verse 78:20: 山峦将被移动，而变成幻影；
Chinese.verse 78:23: 他们将在其中逗留长久的时期。
Chinese.verse 78:24: 他们在其中不能睡眠，不得饮料，
Chinese.verse 78:26: 那是一个很适当的报酬。
Chinese.verse 78:29: 我曾将万事记录在一本天经里。
Chinese.verse 78:30: （将对他们说：）你们尝试吧！我只增加你们所受的刑罚。
Chinese.verse 78:31: 敬畏的人们必有一种收获，
Chinese.verse 78:33: 和两乳圆润，年龄划一的少女，
Chinese.verse 78:35: 他们在那里面听不到恶言和谎话。
Chinese.verse 78:36: 那是从你的主发出的报酬　　充足的赏赐。
Chinese.verse 78:37: 他是天地万物的主，是至仁的主，他们不敢向他陈说。
Chinese.verse 78:38: 在精神和众天神排班肃立之日，他们不得说话，唯至仁主所特许而且能说正话的，才敢发言。
Chinese.verse 78:39: 那是必有的日子，谁意欲，谁就择取一个向他的主的归宿。
Chinese.verse 78:40: 我的确警告你们一种临近的刑罚，在那日，各人将要看见自己所已做的工作，不信道的人们将要说：啊！但愿我原是尘土。

Danish.verse 78:4: Waarlijk, zij zullen het spoedig te weten komen
Danish.verse 78:5: Nogmaals zij zullen het weldra te weten komen
Danish.verse 78:6: Hebben Wij de aarde niet als een bed gespreid
Danish.verse 78:7: En de bergen als palen opgezet
Danish.verse 78:8: En hebben Wij u niet in paren geschapen
Danish.verse 78:9: En hebben Wij uw slaap niet tot rusten bestemd
Danish.verse 78:10: En hebben Wij de nacht niet als een mantel gemaakt
Danish.verse 78:11: En hebben Wij de dag niet voor (het zoeken) naar levensonderhoud gemaakt
Danish.verse 78:12: En hebben Wij niet zeven sterke (hemelen) boven u gebouwd
Danish.verse 78:13: En daarin een stralende lamp geplaatst
Danish.verse 78:14: En zenden Wij niet vanuit de wolken regen neder die voortstroomt
Danish.verse 78:15: Opdat Wij daardoor graan en plantengroei voortbrengen
Danish.verse 78:17: Voorzeker, de Dag der beslissing is bepaald
Danish.verse 78:18: De Dag waarop de bazuin wordt geblazen; dan zult gij in scharen komen
Danish.verse 78:19: En de hemel wordt geopend en zal vele poorten hebben
Danish.verse 78:20: En de bergen verdwijnen en worden tot een luchtspiegeling
Danish.verse 78:21: Voorzeker de hel ligt in een hinderlaag
Danish.verse 78:23: Die daarin lange tijd zullen vertoeven
Danish.verse 78:24: Zij zullen daar geen koelte hebben en geen dronk smaken
Danish.verse 78:25: Behalve kokend water en een stinkende vloeistof die verschrikkelijk koud is
Danish.verse 78:29: En Wij hebben alles in een boek neergeschreven
Danish.verse 78:30: Smaakt dus de straf! Wij zullen u slechts hierin doen toenemen
Danish.verse 78:31: Voorwaar, er is triomf voor de rechtvaardigen
Danish.verse 78:33: En jeugdige gezellen, gelijk in leeftijd
Danish.verse 78:35: Zij horen daar geen ijdele gesprekken noch leugens
Danish.verse 78:36: Een beloning van uw Heer, een toereikende gave
Danish.verse 78:37: Van de Heer der hemelen en der aarde en van alles wat daar tussen is, de Barmhartige. Niemand zal Hem kunnen aanspreken
Danish.verse 78:38: De Dag waarop de Geest en de (andere) engelen in gelederen opgesteld staan, zullen zij niet spreken, met uitzondering van hem aan wie de Barmhartige het toestaat en die alleen zal spreken wat recht is
Danish.verse 78:39: Die Dag is de werkelijkheid. Daarom, laat hij die het wil een toevlucht bij zijn Heer zoeken
Danish.verse 78:40: Voorwaar, Wij hebben u voor een straf die nabij is gewaarschuwd; de Dag waarop de mens zal zien wat hij heeft uitgevoerd en (waarop) de ongelovige zal zeggen: O, ware ik maar stof geweest

Dutch.verse 78:5: Nogmaals nee, zij zullen het weten.
Dutch.verse 78:6: Hebben Wij de aarde niet tot een uitgespreide plaats gemaakt?
Dutch.verse 78:8: En Wij hebben jullie in paren geschapen.
Dutch.verse 78:9: En Wij hebben voor jullie de slaap gemaakt, als rust.
Dutch.verse 78:10: En Wij hebben de nacht als een bedekking gemaakt.
Dutch.verse 78:11: En Wij hebben de dag gemaakt om levensonderhoud te zoeken.
Dutch.verse 78:12: En Wij hebben boven jullie zeven hechte hemelen gebouwd.
Dutch.verse 78:13: En Wij hebben daarin een stralende lamp geplaatst.
Dutch.verse 78:14: En Wij hebben uit de wolken stromend water gezonden.
Dutch.verse 78:15: Opdat Wij daarmee graan en planten voortbrengen.
Dutch.verse 78:17: Voorwaar, de Dag van de Beoordeling is op een vastgesteld tijdstip.
Dutch.verse 78:18: De Dag waarop op de bazuin wordt geblazen zullen jullie komen, groep na groep.
Dutch.verse 78:19: En de hemel wordt geopend en zij heeft vele poorten.
Dutch.verse 78:20: En de bergen worden verpulverd en worden tot luchtspiegelingen.
Dutch.verse 78:21: Voorwaar, de Hel is als een hinderlaag.
Dutch.verse 78:24: Zij zullen daarin geen koelte en geen drank proeven.
Dutch.verse 78:27: Voorwaar, zij verwachtten nooit een afrekening.
Dutch.verse 78:29: En Wij hebben alle zaken in een Boek opgesomd.
Dutch.verse 78:30: Proeft daarom de straf, en er is voor jullie geen vermeerdering, behalve van de bestraffing.
Dutch.verse 78:31: Voorwaar, voor de Moettaqôen is er een overwinning.
Dutch.verse 78:33: En jeugdige gezellinnen, gelijk in leeftijd.
Dutch.verse 78:35: Zij horen daar geen onzin en geen leugens.
Dutch.verse 78:36: Als een beloning van jouw Heer, als afrekenende gift.
Dutch.verse 78:37: De Heer der hemelen en der aarde en wat er tussen beide is, de Barmhartige. Zij zijn niet in staat Hem aan te spreken.
Dutch.verse 78:38: Op die Dag staan de Geest (Djibrîl) en de Engelen in rijen opgesteld. Zij spreken niet, behalve na wie de Barmhartige toestemming verleent en die zegt wat juist is.
Dutch.verse 78:39: Dat is de Dag van de Waarheid. Laat wie wil daarom een terugkeer naar zijn Heer afleggen.
Dutch.verse 78:40: Voorwaar, Wij hebben jullie gewaarschuwd voor een nabije bestraffing op de Dag dat de mens zal kijken naar wat zijn handen vroeger bedreven, en waarop de ongelovige zal zeggen: "O wee, was ik maar aarde."

English.verse 78:1: About what are they asking one another?
English.verse 78:3: That over which they are in disagreement.
English.verse 78:4: No! They are going to know.
English.verse 78:5: Then, no! They are going to know.
English.verse 78:6: Have We not made the earth a resting place? (Have we not smoothed the Earth's surface?)
English.verse 78:8: And We created you in pairs
English.verse 78:9: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
English.verse 78:10: And made the night as clothing
English.verse 78:11: And made the day for livelihood
English.verse 78:12: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
English.verse 78:14: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
English.verse 78:15: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
English.verse 78:17: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
English.verse 78:18: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
English.verse 78:19: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
English.verse 78:20: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
English.verse 78:21: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
English.verse 78:22: For the transgressors, a place of return,
English.verse 78:23: In which they will remain for ages [unending].
English.verse 78:24: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
English.verse 78:27: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
English.verse 78:28: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
English.verse 78:29: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
English.verse 78:30: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
English.verse 78:31: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
English.verse 78:35: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
English.verse 78:36: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,
English.verse 78:37: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
English.verse 78:38: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
English.verse 78:39: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
English.verse 78:40: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"

Filipino.verse 78:1: Ano baga ang kanilang pinagtatalunan (sa isa’t isa)
Filipino.verse 78:2: Tungkol ba sa Malaking Balita (alalaong baga, ang Islam, Kaisahan ni Allah, ang Qur’an na dinala ni Propeta Muhammad, ang Araw ng Muling Pagkabuhay, atbp)
Filipino.verse 78:3: Na dahil dito, sila ay hindi nagkakasundo
Filipino.verse 78:4: Katotohanan! 934 Hindi magtatagal at kanilang mapag-aalaman
Filipino.verse 78:5: Katotohanan! Katotohanan! Hindi magtatagal at kanilang mapag-aalaman
Filipino.verse 78:6: Hindi baga ginawa Namin ang kalupaan na malawak (bilang himlayan)
Filipino.verse 78:7: At ang kabundukan bilang pampatatag (na may ugat)
Filipino.verse 78:8: At Aming nilikha kayo sa pares (lalaki at babae, mataas at mababa, mabuti at masama, atbp)
Filipino.verse 78:9: At Aming ginawaran kayo ng pagtulog (o antok upang maidlip), sa inyong pamamahinga
Filipino.verse 78:10: At ginawa Namin ang gabi bilang pantakip (sa pamamagitan ng kanyang kadiliman)
Filipino.verse 78:11: At ginawa Namin ang araw (maghapon) tungo sa inyong ikabubuhay
Filipino.verse 78:12: At itinatag Namin sa itaas ninyo ang pitong matatatag (na kalangitan)
Filipino.verse 78:13: At ginawaran Namin yaon ng Marilag na Liwanag (sikat ng araw)
Filipino.verse 78:14: At nagpamalisbis Kami ng saganang ulan mula sa kimpal ng mga ulap
Filipino.verse 78:15: Upang mapatubo Namin dito (sa pag-aani) ang mga butil at mga gulayan
Filipino.verse 78:16: At mga halamang mayabong at luntian
Filipino.verse 78:17: Katotohanan! Ang Araw ng Pagpapasya (sa katarungan) ay natatakdaang panahon
Filipino.verse 78:18: Sa Araw na ang Tambuli ay hihipan at kayo ay magsisiparito ng langkay-langkay (at sa maraming pangkat)
Filipino.verse 78:19: At ang kalangitan ay bubuksan na waring mga pintuan
Filipino.verse 78:20: At ang kabundukan ay maglalaho sa kanilang kinatatayuan na tulad ng isang malikmata
Filipino.verse 78:21: Katotohanan! Ang Impiyerno ay matutulad (sa isang pook) ng pagtambang
Filipino.verse 78:22: Bilang isang Tahanan sa Taghun (sila na lumalabag at sumusuway sa hangganan na itinakda ni Allah, katulad ng mga mapagsamba sa diyus-diyosan, walang pananalig sa Kaisahan ni Allah at sa Islam, mga mapagkunwari, mga makasalanan, mga kriminal, atbp)
Filipino.verse 78:23: Magsisipanatili sila rito sa mahabang panahon
Filipino.verse 78:24: dito ay wala silang malalasap na lamig (at ginhawa), ni anumang inumin (na pampasigla)
Filipino.verse 78:25: Maliban sa kumukulong tubig at maruming katas ng sugat (nana, dugo, atbp)
Filipino.verse 78:26: Na siyang katumbas na kabayaran (ayon sa kanilang kabuktutan)
Filipino.verse 78:27: Sapagkat katotohanang sila ay hindi nagbigay pahalaga ( at nangamba) tungo sa (araw) ng pagsusulit (ng kanilang mga gawa)
Filipino.verse 78:28: At ganap nilang itinuring na walang katotohanan ang Aming Ayat (kapahayagan, tanda, katibayan, aral, atbp)
Filipino.verse 78:29: At ang lahat ng bagay ay Aming itinala sa napapangalagaang Aklat
Filipino.verse 78:30: Kaya’t lasapin ninyo ang bunga (na inani) ng inyong masasamang gawa, at kayo ay hindi Namin bibigyan ng anuman maliban sa Kaparusahan
Filipino.verse 78:31: Katotohanan! Sa Muttaqun (mga matutuwid at mabubuting tao na sumusunod sa lahat ng ipinag-uutos ni Allah at umiiwas sa lahat ng Kanyang ipinagbabawal) ay tagumpay, at katuparan ng kanilang inaasam (Paraiso)
Filipino.verse 78:32: Na napapalibutan ng Halamanan at malinamnam na ubasan
Filipino.verse 78:33: At mga birheng dalaga na magkakatulad sa gulang
Filipino.verse 78:34: At ng tigib na Kopita (ng alak)
Filipino.verse 78:35: dito ay wala silang maririnig na hinagpis o kasinungalingan (sa pag- uusap)
Filipino.verse 78:36: Isang kabayaran mula sa inyong Panginoon, isang Biyayang sagana
Filipino.verse 78:37: Mula sa Panginoon ng kalangitan at kalupaan at anumang nasa pagitan nito, ang diyos na Lubos na Mapagbigay ng biyaya, at walang sinuman (ang may kapamahalaan) na makakasalansang sa Kanya (sa Araw ng Muling Pagkabuhay), malibang Kanyang pahintulutan
Filipino.verse 78:38: SaAraw na ang ruh (si Gabriel o ibangAnghel) at iba pang anghel ay nakatindig (nang tuwid at maayos) sa mga hanay, at hindi makakapangusap malibang pahintulutan siya ng Lubos na Mapagbigay (Allah), at kanyang ipagsasaysay kung ano ang matuwid
Filipino.verse 78:39: Ito ang Araw ng Katotohanan na walang alinlangan, kaya’t sinuman ang magnais, hayaang tahakin niya ang Pagbabalik, sa tuwid na landas ng kanyang Panginoon (sa pamamagitan ng pagsunod sa Kanya sa buhay sa mundong ito)
Filipino.verse 78:40: Katotohanang Aming pinaaalalahanan kayo ng daratal na Kaparusahan. Sa Araw na ang tao ay makakapagmalas (sa gawa) ng kanyang kamay kung saan siya inihantong. Ang mga hindi sumasampalataya ay magsasabi: “ Kasawian sa akin! Sana ay naging alabok na lamang ako!”

French.verse 78:3: à propos de laquelle ils divergent.
French.verse 78:4: Eh bien non! Ils sauront bientôt.
French.verse 78:5: Encore une fois, non! Ils sauront bientôt.
French.verse 78:6: N'avons-Nous pas fait de la terre une couche?
French.verse 78:7: et (placé) les montagnes comme des piquets?
French.verse 78:8: Nous vous avons créés en couples,
French.verse 78:9: et désigné votre sommeil pour votre repos,
French.verse 78:10: et fait de la nuit un vêtement,
French.verse 78:11: et assigné le jour pour les affaires de la vie,
French.verse 78:12: et construit au-dessus de vous sept (cieux) renforcés,
French.verse 78:13: et [y] avons placé une lampe (le soleil) très ardente,
French.verse 78:14: et fait descendre des nuées une eau abondante
French.verse 78:15: pour faire pousser par elle grains et plantes
French.verse 78:17: Le Jour de la Décision [du Jugement] a son terme fixé.
French.verse 78:18: Le jour où l'on soufflera dans la Trompe, vous viendrez par troupes,
French.verse 78:19: et le ciel sera ouvert et [présentera] des portes,
French.verse 78:20: et les montagnes seront mises en marche et deviendront un mirage.
French.verse 78:23: Ils y demeureront pendant des siècles successifs.
French.verse 78:24: Ils n'y goûteront ni fraîcheur ni breuvage,
French.verse 78:25: Hormis une eau bouillante et un pus
French.verse 78:27: Car ils ne s'attendaient pas à rendre compte,
French.verse 78:28: et traitaient de mensonges, continuellement, Nos versets,
French.verse 78:29: alors que Nous avons dénombré toutes choses en écrit.
French.verse 78:30: Goûtez-donc. Nous n'augmenterons pour vous que le châtiment!
French.verse 78:31: Pour les pieux ce sera une réussite:
French.verse 78:33: et des (belles) aux seins arrondis, d'une égale jeunesse,
French.verse 78:35: Ils n'y entendront ni futilités ni mensonges.
French.verse 78:36: A titre de récompense de ton Seigneur et à titre de don abondant
French.verse 78:37: du Seigneur des cieux et de la terre et de ce qui existe entre eux, le Tout Miséricordieux; ils n'osent nullement Lui adresser la parole.
French.verse 78:38: Le jour où l'Esprit et les Anges se dresseront en rangs, nul ne saura parler, sauf celui à qui le Tout Miséricordieux aura accordé la permission, et qui dira la vérité.
French.verse 78:39: Ce jour-là est inéluctable. Que celui qui veut prenne donc refuge auprès de son Seigneur.
French.verse 78:40: Nous vous avons avertis d'un châtiment bien proche, le jour où l'homme verra ce que ses deux mains ont préparé; et l'infidèle dira: «Hélas pour moi! Comme j'aurais aimé n'être que poussière».

Fulah.verse 78:6: Mbela Min mbaɗaani leydi ndaɗɗudi keblaandi
Fulah.verse 78:10: Min mbaɗi jemma o ko sutura
Fulah.verse 78:11: Min mbaɗi ñalawma ko yiilaraade nguura
Fulah.verse 78:12: Min mahi dow mon jeeɗiɗi cattuɗi
Fulah.verse 78:14: Min tellini ummaade e duule ndiyam njuppajam sanne
Fulah.verse 78:15: Ngam Min njaltina heen gabbe e puɗi
Fulah.verse 78:17: Pellet, ko ñalaande Senndindiro ngon, laatinooma ko saatinaa
Fulah.verse 78:18: Ñande allaadu ndu wutta ma on ngardu pelle pelle
Fulah.verse 78:19: Kammu on udditee mbo laato dame
Fulah.verse 78:20: Pelle ɗe yahnaa ɗe ngonta merere
Fulah.verse 78:24: ɓe meeɗatah toon ɓuuɓol wolla ndiyam ɓuuɓɗam
Fulah.verse 78:26: Njobdi kawrundi e koɓe ngonno ko
Fulah.verse 78:27: Pellet ɓe ngoniina ɓe njoortaaki haasboore
Fulah.verse 78:29: Kala huunde min tonngirii nde binndol
Fulah.verse 78:30: Meeɗe Min ɓeydantah on si wonah lepte
Fulah.verse 78:31: Pellet na woodani hulɓe Alla ɓe foolirde
Fulah.verse 78:35: Ɓe nanataa nder toon haala meere, wanaa ko bakkondiŋta
Fulah.verse 78:36: Ko njoɓdi ummaade ka Alla e dokke keƴɗe
Fulah.verse 78:37: jom kammu e leydi e ko woni hakkunde mum en jurmtooɗo Mbo ɓe ngalah e dow Mum haala
Fulah.verse 78:38: Ñande jibriil ummii tawa malayka en na waɗi sappeeli ɓe haalatah si wonah mbo Alla sakkitani o haala ko feewi
Fulah.verse 78:39: Ko oon woni ñalngu goongo kala faalaaɗo daɗde nanngira joomiiko ruttorde
Fulah.verse 78:40: Min njeertinii on lepte ɓadiiɗe ñande aade ndaari ko juuɗe mum mbaɗno keefeero o wiya haaniina mi woniina leydi

German.verse 78:3: über die sie sich uneinig sind.
German.verse 78:5: Abermals: Keineswegs! Sie werden (es noch) erfahren.
German.verse 78:6: Haben Wir nicht die Erde zu einer Lagerstatt gemacht
German.verse 78:8: Und Wir haben euch als Paare erschaffen.
German.verse 78:9: Und Wir haben euren Schlaf zum Ausruhen gemacht.
German.verse 78:10: Und Wir haben die Nacht zum Kleid gemacht.
German.verse 78:11: Und Wir haben den Tag zur Lebensführung gemacht.
German.verse 78:12: Und Wir haben über euch sieben feste (Himmel) aufgebaut.
German.verse 78:13: Und Wir haben einen hell glühenden Leuchtkörper gemacht.
German.verse 78:14: Und Wir haben von den Regenwolken sich ergießendes Wasser herabkommen lassen,
German.verse 78:15: um damit Korn und Gewächse hervorzubringen
German.verse 78:17: Gewiß, der Tag der Entscheidung ist eine festgesetzte Zeit,
German.verse 78:18: der Tag, da ins Horn geblasen wird und ihr in Scharen herkommt
German.verse 78:19: und da der Himmel geöffnet und dann zu Toren wird
German.verse 78:20: und da die Berge versetzt und dann zu einer Luftspiegelung werden.
German.verse 78:21: Gewiß, die Hölle ist ein Hinterhalt,
German.verse 78:22: für diejenigen, die das Maß (an Frevel) überschreiten, eine Heimstatt,
German.verse 78:24: sie werden darin weder Kühlung noch Getränk kosten,
German.verse 78:25: außer heißem Wasser und stinkender Brühe,
German.verse 78:27: Sie erwarteten ja niemals eine Abrechnung
German.verse 78:28: und erklärten Unsere Zeichen hartnäckig für Lüge.
German.verse 78:29: Doch alles haben Wir schriftlich erfaßt.
German.verse 78:30: So kostet; Wir werden euch nur die Strafe mehren.
German.verse 78:31: Gewiß, für die Gottesfürchtigen wird es einen Ort des Erfolgs geben,
German.verse 78:35: Weder hören sie darin unbedachte Rede noch Lüge.
German.verse 78:36: (Dies) als Belohnung von deinem Herrn, als hinreichende Gabe,
German.verse 78:37: dem Herrn der Himmel und der Erde und dessen, was dazwischen ist, dem Allerbarmer. Sie verfügen nicht darüber, vor Ihm zu reden,
German.verse 78:38: am Tag, da der Geist und die Engel in Reihe stehen. Sie werden nicht sprechen, außer wem der Allerbarmer es erlaubt und wer Richtiges sagt.
German.verse 78:39: Das ist der wahrhaftig (eintreffend)e Tag. Wer nun will, nimmt zu seinem Herrn eine Heimkehr.
German.verse 78:40: Wir warnen euch ja vor naher Strafe, am Tag, da der Mensch schauen wird, was seine Hände vorausgeschickt haben, und der Ungläubige sagen wird: "O wäre ich doch Erde!"

Hausa.verse 78:1: A kan mẽ suke tambayar jũna?
Hausa.verse 78:2: A kan muhimmin lãbãri mai girma (Alƙur'ãni)?
Hausa.verse 78:3: Wanda suke sãɓa wa jũna a cikinsa?
Hausa.verse 78:6: Ashe, ba Mu sanya ƙasa shimfiɗa ba?
Hausa.verse 78:8: Kuma, Mun halitta ku mazã da mãtã?
Hausa.verse 78:10: Kuma, Muka sanya dare (ya zama) sutura?
Hausa.verse 78:11: Kuma, Muka sanya yini (yazama) lõkacin nẽman abinci?
Hausa.verse 78:12: Kuma, Muka gina, a samanku, sammai bakwai mãsu ƙarfi?
Hausa.verse 78:13: Kuma, Muka sanya fitila mai tsanin haske (rãnã)?
Hausa.verse 78:14: Kuma, Muka saukar daga cikakkun girãgizai, ruwa mai yawan zuba?
Hausa.verse 78:15: Dõmin, Mu fitar da ƙwaya da tsiri game da shi?
Hausa.verse 78:17: Lalle ne, rãnar rarrabẽwa tã kasance abin ƙayyadẽ wa lõkaci.
Hausa.verse 78:18: Rãnar da zã a yi bũsa a cikin ƙaho, sai ku zo, jama'a jama'a.
Hausa.verse 78:19: Kuma, aka buɗe sama, sai ta kasance ƙõfõfi.
Hausa.verse 78:20: Kuma, aka tafiyar da duwãtsu, sai suka kasance ƙũra.
Hausa.verse 78:21: Lalle ne, Jahannama tã kasance madãkata.
Hausa.verse 78:22: Ga mãsu ƙẽtare iyãkõki, tã zama makõma.
Hausa.verse 78:23: Sunã, mãsu zama a cikinta, zãmunna.
Hausa.verse 78:24: Bã su ɗanɗanãwar wani sanyi a cikinta, kuma bã su ɗanɗana abin sha.
Hausa.verse 78:25: Fãce tafasasshen ruwa da ruɓaɓɓen jini.
Hausa.verse 78:27: Lalle ne, sũ, sun kasance bã su fãtar sauƙin wani hisãbi.
Hausa.verse 78:28: Kuma, suka ƙaryata game da ãyõyinMu, ƙaryatãwa!
Hausa.verse 78:29: Alhãli, kõwane abu Mun ƙididdigẽ shi, a rubũce.
Hausa.verse 78:30: Sabõda haka, ku ɗanɗana domin haka, bã zã Mu ƙara muku kõme ba fãce azãba.
Hausa.verse 78:31: Lalle ne, mãsu taƙawã nã da wani wurin sãmun babban rabo.
Hausa.verse 78:35: Bã su jin yãsassar magana, a cikinta, kuma bã su jin ƙaryatãwa.
Hausa.verse 78:36: Dõmin sakamako daga Ubangijinka, kyautã mai yawa.
Hausa.verse 78:37: Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa da abin da yake a tsakãninsu, Mai rahama, bã su da ikon yin wata magana daga gare Shi.
Hausa.verse 78:38: Rãnar da Rũhi da malã'iku zã su tsaya a cikin safu, bã su magana, sai wanda Allah Ya yi masa izni, kuma ya faɗi abin da ke daidai.
Hausa.verse 78:39: Wancan, shi ne yini na gaskiya; to wanda ya so, ya riƙa makõma zuwa ga Ubangijinsa.
Hausa.verse 78:40: Lalle ne, Mũ, Mun yi muku gargaɗin azãba makusanciya, rãnar da mutum ke dũbi zuwa ga abin da hannãyensa suka aikata, kuma kafiri ya ce: "Kaitona, dã dai nã zama turɓãya!"

Hindi.verse 78:1: ये लोग आपस में किस चीज़ का हाल पूछते हैं
Hindi.verse 78:3: जिसमें लोग एख्तेलाफ कर रहे हैं
Hindi.verse 78:4: देखो उन्हें अनक़रीब ही मालूम हो जाएगा
Hindi.verse 78:5: फिर इन्हें अनक़रीब ही ज़रूर मालूम हो जाएगा
Hindi.verse 78:7: और पहाड़ों को (ज़मीन) की मेख़े नहीं बनाया
Hindi.verse 78:8: और हमने तुम लोगों को जोड़ा जोड़ा पैदा किया
Hindi.verse 78:9: और तुम्हारी नींद को आराम (का बाइस) क़रार दिया
Hindi.verse 78:11: और हम ही ने दिन को (कसब) मआश (का वक्त) बनाया
Hindi.verse 78:12: और तुम्हारे ऊपर सात मज़बूत (आसमान) बनाए
Hindi.verse 78:13: और हम ही ने (सूरज) को रौशन चिराग़ बनाया
Hindi.verse 78:14: और हम ही ने बादलों से मूसलाधार पानी बरसाया
Hindi.verse 78:15: ताकि उसके ज़रिए से दाने और सबज़ी
Hindi.verse 78:16: और घने घने बाग़ पैदा करें
Hindi.verse 78:17: बेशक फैसले का दिन मुक़र्रर है
Hindi.verse 78:18: जिस दिन सूर फूँका जाएगा और तुम लोग गिरोह गिरोह हाज़िर होगे
Hindi.verse 78:20: तो (उसमें) दरवाज़े हो जाएँगे और पहाड़ (अपनी जगह से) चलाए जाएँगे तो रेत होकर रह जाएँगे
Hindi.verse 78:24: न वहाँ ठन्डक का मज़ा चखेंगे और न खौलते हुए पानी
Hindi.verse 78:25: और बहती हुई पीप के सिवा कुछ पीने को मिलेगा
Hindi.verse 78:26: (ये उनकी कारस्तानियों का) पूरा पूरा बदला है
Hindi.verse 78:27: बेशक ये लोग आख़ेरत के हिसाब की उम्मीद ही न रखते थे
Hindi.verse 78:28: और इन लोगो हमारी आयतों को बुरी तरह झुठलाया
Hindi.verse 78:29: और हमने हर चीज़ को लिख कर मनज़बत कर रखा है
Hindi.verse 78:30: तो अब तुम मज़ा चखो हमतो तुम पर अज़ाब ही बढ़ाते जाएँगे
Hindi.verse 78:31: बेशक परहेज़गारों के लिए बड़ी कामयाबी है
Hindi.verse 78:33: और वह औरतें जिनकी उठती हुई जवानियाँ
Hindi.verse 78:34: और बाहम हमजोलियाँ हैं और शराब के लबरेज़ साग़र
Hindi.verse 78:35: और शराब के लबरेज़ साग़र वहाँ न बेहूदा बात सुनेंगे और न झूठ
Hindi.verse 78:36: (ये) तुम्हारे परवरदिगार की तरफ से काफ़ी इनाम और सिला है
Hindi.verse 78:37: जो सारे आसमान और ज़मीन और जो इन दोनों के बीच में है सबका मालिक है बड़ा मेहरबान लोगों को उससे बात का पूरा न होगा
Hindi.verse 78:38: जिस दिन जिबरील और फरिश्ते (उसके सामने) पर बाँध कर खड़े होंगे (उस दिन) उससे कोई बात न कर सकेगा मगर जिसे ख़ुदा इजाज़त दे और वह ठिकाने की बात कहे
Hindi.verse 78:39: वह दिन बरहक़ है तो जो शख़्श चाहे अपने परवरदिगार की बारगाह में (अपना) ठिकाना बनाए
Hindi.verse 78:40: हमने तुम लोगों को अनक़रीब आने वाले अज़ाब से डरा दिया जिस दिन आदमी अपने हाथों पहले से भेजे हुए (आमाल) को देखेगा और काफ़िर कहेगा काश मैं ख़ाक हो जाता

Indonesian.verse 78:4: Sekali-kali tidak; kelak mereka akan mengetahui,
Indonesian.verse 78:5: kemudian sekali-kali tidak; kelak mereka mengetahui.
Indonesian.verse 78:6: Bukankah Kami telah menjadikan bumi itu sebagai hamparan?,
Indonesian.verse 78:9: dan Kami jadikan tidurmu untuk istirahat,
Indonesian.verse 78:10: dan Kami jadikan malam sebagai pakaian,
Indonesian.verse 78:11: dan Kami jadikan siang untuk mencari penghidupan,
Indonesian.verse 78:12: dan Kami bina di atas kamu tujuh buah (langit) yang kokoh,
Indonesian.verse 78:13: dan Kami jadikan pelita yang amat terang (matahari),
Indonesian.verse 78:14: dan Kami turunkan dari awan air yang banyak tercurah,
Indonesian.verse 78:15: supaya Kami tumbuhkan dengan air itu biji-bijian dan tumbuh-tumbuhan,
Indonesian.verse 78:17: Sesungguhnya Hari Keputusan adalah suatu waktu yang ditetapkan,
Indonesian.verse 78:18: yaitu hari (yang pada waktu itu) ditiup sangkakala lalu kamu datang berkelompok-kelompok,
Indonesian.verse 78:19: dan dibukalah langit, maka terdapatlah beberapa pintu,
Indonesian.verse 78:20: dan dijalankanlah gunung-gunung maka menjadi fatamorganalah ia.
Indonesian.verse 78:21: Sesungguhnya neraka Jahannam itu (padanya) ada tempat pengintai,
Indonesian.verse 78:22: lagi menjadi tempat kembali bagi orang-orang yang melampaui batas,
Indonesian.verse 78:23: mereka tinggal di dalamnya berabad-abad lamanya,
Indonesian.verse 78:24: mereka tidak merasakan kesejukan di dalamnya dan tidak (pula mendapat) minuman,
Indonesian.verse 78:25: selain air yang mendidih dan nanah,
Indonesian.verse 78:27: Sesungguhnya mereka tidak berharap (takut) kepada hisab,
Indonesian.verse 78:28: dan mereka mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami dengan sesungguh-sungguhnya.
Indonesian.verse 78:29: Dan segala sesuatu telah Kami catat dalam suatu kitab.
Indonesian.verse 78:30: Karena itu rasakanlah. Dan Kami sekali-kali tidak akan menambah kepada kamu selain daripada azab.
Indonesian.verse 78:31: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang bertakwa mendapat kemenangan,
Indonesian.verse 78:35: Di dalamnya mereka tidak mendengar perkataan yang sia-sia dan tidak (pula) perkataan dusta.
Indonesian.verse 78:36: Sebagai pembalasan dari Tuhanmu dan pemberian yang cukup banyak,
Indonesian.verse 78:37: Tuhan Yang memelihara langit dan bumi dan apa yang ada di antara keduanya; Yang Maha Pemurah. Mereka tidak dapat berbicara dengan Dia.
Indonesian.verse 78:38: Pada hari, ketika ruh dan para malaikat berdiri bershaf-shaf, mereka tidak berkata-kata, kecuali siapa yang telah diberi izin kepadanya oleh Tuhan Yang Maha Pemurah; dan ia mengucapkan kata yang benar.
Indonesian.verse 78:39: Itulah hari yang pasti terjadi. Maka barangsiapa yang menghendaki, niscaya ia menempuh jalan kembali kepada Tuhannya.
Indonesian.verse 78:40: Sesungguhnya Kami telah memperingatkan kepadamu (hai orang kafir) siksa yang dekat, pada hari manusia melihat apa yang telah diperbuat oleh kedua tangannya; dan orang kafir berkata: "Alangkah baiknya sekiranya aku dahulu adalah tanah".

Italian.verse 78:1: Su cosa si interrogano a vicenda?
Italian.verse 78:3: a proposito del quale sono discordi.
Italian.verse 78:6: Non facemmo della terra una culla,
Italian.verse 78:9: e facciamo del vostro sonno un riposo,
Italian.verse 78:11: e del giorno un mezzo per le incombenze della vita.
Italian.verse 78:12: Costruimmo sopra di voi sette solidi [cieli]
Italian.verse 78:13: e vi ponemmo una lampada ardente;
Italian.verse 78:14: facciamo scendere dalle nuvole un'acqua abbondante
Italian.verse 78:17: Invero il Giorno della Decisione è stabilito.
Italian.verse 78:18: Il Giorno in cui verrà soffiato nel Corno, accorrerete a frotte;
Italian.verse 78:19: sarà spalancato il cielo e [sarà tutto] porte,
Italian.verse 78:20: e le montagne saranno messe in marcia, diventando un miraggio.
Italian.verse 78:24: senza gustare né freschezza né bevanda,
Italian.verse 78:25: eccetto acqua bollente o liquido infetto.
Italian.verse 78:28: sfrontatamente tacciavano di menzogna i Nostri segni,
Italian.verse 78:29: mentre di ogni cosa abbiamo tenuto conto per iscritto.
Italian.verse 78:30: E allora gustate [il tormento]! A voi non accresceremo null'altro che il castigo.
Italian.verse 78:31: In verità avranno successo i timorati:
Italian.verse 78:33: fanciulle dai seni pieni e coetanee,
Italian.verse 78:35: Non udranno colà né vanità né menzogna:
Italian.verse 78:36: compenso del tuo Signore, dono adeguato
Italian.verse 78:37: da parte del Signore dei cieli e della terra e di ciò che vi è frammezzo, del Compassionevole, Cui non oseranno rivolgere la parola.
Italian.verse 78:38: Il Giorno in cui lo Spirito e gli angeli si ergeranno in schiere, nessuno oserà parlare, eccetto colui cui il Compassionevole l'avrà permesso e che dirà cose vere.
Italian.verse 78:39: Quel Giorno [verrà] ineluttabilmente. Si rifugi quindi presso il suo Signore chi vuole.
Italian.verse 78:40: In verità vi abbiamo avvertito di un castigo imminente, il Giorno in cui l'uomo vedrà quello che le sue mani avranno preparato e dirà il miscredente: “Ahimè, fossi io polvere!”.

Japanese.verse 78:1: 何事に就いて， かれらは尋ね合うのか。
Japanese.verse 78:3: それに就いて，かれらは意見が果なる。
Japanese.verse 78:4: いや，かれらはやがて知ろう．
Japanese.verse 78:5: いや，いや，かれらはやがて知るであろう。
Japanese.verse 78:6: われは大地を，広々としなかったか。
Japanese.verse 78:7: また山々を，杭としたてはないか。
Japanese.verse 78:8: われはあなたがたを両性に創り，
Japanese.verse 78:9: また休息のため，あなたがたの睡眠を定め，
Japanese.verse 78:11: 昼を生計の手段として定めた。
Japanese.verse 78:12: またわれは，あなたがたの上に堅固に7層（の天）を打ち建て，
Japanese.verse 78:13: 輝やかしい灯し火を（その中に）字置き，
Japanese.verse 78:14: われは雲から豊かに雨を降らせ，
Japanese.verse 78:15: それによって，殻物や野菜を萠え出させ，
Japanese.verse 78:17: 本当に裁きの日は定められていて，
Japanese.verse 78:18: その日，ラッパが吹かれるとあなたがたは群をなして出て来る。
Japanese.verse 78:19: 天は開かれて数々の門となり，
Japanese.verse 78:20: 山々は移されて蜃気楼のようになる。
Japanese.verse 78:21: 本当に地獄は，待ち伏せの場であり，
Japanese.verse 78:23: かれらは何時までもその中に住むであろう。
Japanese.verse 78:24: そこで涼しさも味わえず，（どんな）飲物もない，
Japanese.verse 78:25: 煮えたぎる湯と膿の外には。
Japanese.verse 78:26: （かれらのため）相応しい報奨である。
Japanese.verse 78:27: 本当にかれらは，（その行いに対する）清算を希望しないでいた。
Japanese.verse 78:28: またかれらはわが印を嘘であると言って，強く拒否した。
Japanese.verse 78:29: われは一切のことを，天の書に留めている。
Japanese.verse 78:30: だからあなたがたは（自分の行いの結果を）味わえ。われは懲罰を増加するばかりである。
Japanese.verse 78:31: 本当に主を畏れる者には，安全な場所（楽園）がある。
Japanese.verse 78:33: 胸の脹れた同じ年頃の乙女たち，
Japanese.verse 78:34: またなみなみと（溢？）れる杯。
Japanese.verse 78:35: そこではつまらぬ話や偽り言を聞かない。
Japanese.verse 78:36: これらはあなたの主からの報奨，賜物の決算である。
Japanese.verse 78:37: 天と地，そしてその間の凡てのものの主，慈悲深き御方（からの賜物であり），誰もかれに語りかけることは出来ない。
Japanese.verse 78:38: 聖霊と天使たちが，整列して立つ日，慈悲深き御方から御許しを得て正しいことを言う者以外には，誰も口をきくことが出来ない。
Japanese.verse 78:39: それは真実の日である。だから誰でも望む者は，主の御許に戻るがいい。
Japanese.verse 78:40: 本当にわれは，懲罰が近いと，あなたがたに警告した。その日，人は，自分の両方の手が前もって行ったもの（所業）を見るであろう。不信者は，「ああ，情けない，わたしが塵であったならば。」と言うであろう。

Kazakh.verse 78:1: Олар бір-бірінен не туралы сұрасып жатыр
Kazakh.verse 78:4: Жоқ, олай емес! Олар жақында біледі
Kazakh.verse 78:5: Кейін, тіпті олай емес! Олар әлі-ақ біледі

Kazakh.verse 78:11: және күндізді тіршілік уақыты етіп жасадық
Kazakh.verse 78:14: Әрі сығылушылардан бұлттардан мол су түсірдік
Kazakh.verse 78:15: онымен дән және өсімдікті шығару үшін

Kazakh.verse 78:18: Ол күні сүр үрленеді де сендер топ-топ болып келесіңдер
Kazakh.verse 78:24: Ол жерде олар салқындықты да, су сын да татпайды

Kazakh.verse 78:28: әрі аяттарымызды мүлде өтірікке шығарған еді
Kazakh.verse 78:29: Ал, Біз барлық нәрсені жазып, есептеп қойдық
Kazakh.verse 78:30: Енді, татыңдар. Сендерге азаптан басқа ешнәрсені арттырмаймыз
Kazakh.verse 78:31: Күмәнсіз, тақуалар Аллаһтың жазасынан қорқып, сақтанушылар үшін игілік мекені
Kazakh.verse 78:35: Олар онда Жәннатта бос сөзді де, өтірікті де естімейді
Kazakh.verse 78:36: Бұл Раббыңнан қайтарым ретінде берілген толық сый
